name: Cheerleader: reverse side of life
description:
Cheerleading not only welcomes people to the stadium and participates in loud parties with players.

There is also a second side. it is a side of mental state, domestic problems and love.

In this novella you will learn about the problems of the protagonist, about life in the hostel and her beautiful roommate.Features
  • Visual novel game with sexy content;
  • Drastic story;
  • Surprising ending;
  • Steam achievements.
